prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Drums, Bass, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features the sounds of Guitar, Piano, Drums, and Bass, but without a Synth Lead.

Style 2:
